roleset.name: experience emotion or sensation

role.descr: entity towards or for whom the emotion is directed

example.name: under pressure
example.text: The colony's consumers feel more pressured than those in any of the other surveyed markets.
example.arg: more pressured than those in any of the other surveyed markets

example.name: all args
example.text: Andrew felt an almost unbearable tenderness for Addiline

example.name: Arg0 and Arg1
example.text: Dexter's feeling of being watched increased as he kept hearing small creaks and breathing sounds.?

roleset.note:
FEEL-V NOTES: Member of VNcls see-30.1-1, marvel-31.3-3. (from feel.01-v)
FEELING-N NOTES: Corresponds with feel.01 (from feeling.01-n)

roleset.name: believe

example.name: government believer
example.text: The government of President Carols Menem feels a significant reduction of principal and interest is the only way the debtproblem may be solved.
example.arg: The government of President Carols Menem
a significant reduction of principal and interest is the only way the debt problem may be solved

example.name: both and emotion and a belief
example.text: We feel very strongly that we really need action across the full range of issues we've identified.
example.arg: that we really need action across the full range of issues we've identified

roleset.note: FEEL-V NOTES: Based on big corpus, comparison with 'believe'. Member of VNcls conjecture-29.5-1, consider-29.9-2. (from feel.02-v)

roleset.name: caress

example.name: sensory
example.text: John felt the lush grass on the skin of his back.
example.arg: on the skin of his back

roleset.note: FEEL-V NOTES: Member of VNcls hunt-35.1 (from feel.03-v)

roleset.name: exhibit a (tactile or emotional) characteristic

example.name: as comfy as
example.text: ``The mountain bike feels as comfortable as the `paperboy' bike you had as a kid, but it can do so much more,'' he says.
example.arg: as comfortable as the `paperboy' bike you had as a kid

roleset.note: FEEL-V NOTES: Member of VNcls stimulus_subject-30.4. (from feel.05-v)

roleset.name: feel like: want, have an inclination

role.descr: like what: thing or action arg0 is inclined towards

example.name: like + NP
example.text: I probably should eat more even if I do n't feel like it
